com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Interface JdbcDomainTranslator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessJdbcTranslator, SqliteJdbcTranslator, StandardJdbcTranslator

    public interface JdbcDomainTranslator
    This interface is used by the JdbcHandler to convert attribute values to values that can be stored in a JDBC database.
    Author:
    DG

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean appendSqlValue(AbstractSqlHandler.SqlStatement stmt, StringBuilder buffer, Domain domain, AttributeDef attributeDef, Object value)
      Either appends a string representation of the attribute value to buffer or adds the value to the list of bound attributes.
      String bindAttributeValue(PreparedStatement ps, Object value, int idx) 
      String bindAttributeValue(PreparedStatement ps, View view, DataField dataField, int idx) 
      Object convertDbValue(Domain domain, Object dbValue)
      Converts a value from the DB to something the domain can handle.
